title: Thai red curry base
ingredients: ['4 garlic cloves, pealed', '1 (5cm) piece ginger or galangal, peeled', '4 bird eye chillies, trimmed but not de-seeded.', '2 fresh lemongrass stalks', '1 teaspoon sesame oil', '2 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 large shallot, finely chopped', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, cubed', '400ml tinned full fat coconut milk', '6 baby corns, cut in half lengthways', '1 red pepper, sliced into strips', 'about 200g oyster mushrooms', '1 tablespoon palm sugar', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 bunch coriander to garnish']
